# maxValue

**Instance Property**

The maximum value the parameter can take.

## Declaration

```swift
var maxValue: Float { get }
```

## Parameter Attributes

- **defaultValue**: The default value of the parameter value.
- **minValue**: The minimum value the parameter can take.
